textBeforeTable: Events Titular Bishop of Thaumacus Bishop Emeritus of Malacca Deceased --> Bishop Emile Marie Luc Alphonse Barillon, M.E.P.
textAfterTable: MicroData Summary for Émile Marie Luc Alphonse Barillon: Bishop Émile Marie Luc Alphonse Barillon M.E.P. (born 18 Oct 1860, died 27 Jul 1935) Bishop Emeritus of Malacca a priest for 50.8 years a bishop for 30.8 years Principal Consecrator: Archbishop Joseph-Adolphe Gandy, M.E.P. † Archbishop of Pondicherry Principal Co-Consecrators: Bishop Eugène-Louis Kleiner, M.E.P. † Bishop of Mysore Archbishop Pierre-Xavier Mugabure, M.E.P. † Titular Archbishop of Sagalassus Episcopal Lineage / Apostolic Succession: Archbishop Joseph-Adolphe Gandy, M.E.P. † (1883) Archbishop of Pondicherry Bishop François-Jean-Marie Laouënan, M.E.P. † (1868) Titular Bishop of Flaviopolis Bishop Etienne-Louis Charbonnaux, M.E.P. † (1845) Titular Bishop of Iasus Bishop Clément Bonnand, M.E.P. † (1833) Titular Bishop of Druzipara Bishop Louis-Charles-Auguste Hébert, M.E.P. † (1811) Titular Bishop of Halicarnassus Bishop Paolo Antonio Roviglia, O.C.D. † (1808) Titular Bishop of Sura Bishop Antonio Ramazzini, O.C.D. † (1795) Titular Bishop of Antiphellus Bishop Luigi Pianazzi, O.C.D. † (1785) Titular Bishop of Usula Bishop Pierre Brigot, M.E.P. † (1757) Titular Bishop of Thabraca Bishop Juan de La Fuente Yepes † (1754) Bishop of
